title: Ratkovská Suchá
text: Ratkovská Suchá is a <a href="village">village</a> and <a href="municipality">municipality</a> in the <a href="Rimavsk%C3%A1%20Sobota%20District">Rimavská Sobota District</a> of the <a href="Bansk%C3%A1%20Bystrica%20Region">Banská Bystrica Region</a> of southern <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>.
